title: (x) PSA gothic (sans) type - Franklin Gothic {Nicolai}
content:
Hi, we need to identify exactly this sans-serif type (from a flash animation on a non-profit organization).  
Thanks!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20070811162047im_/http:/typophile.com/files/cesvi.jpg)

 [‹ (x) slender sans serif Clear Water logo - Allise {Jean}](http://web.archive.org/web/20070811162047/http:/typophile.com/node/19090 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Ecover logo and text on packaging - Futura, Cachet {Richard, Chris M, Dav} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20070811162047/http:/typophile.com/node/19180 "Go to next forum topic")
author: franzlt

comments.content: The grunge effects were applied to this after setting the type, but if you want a worn Franklin Gothic out of the box, [Frankie](http://web.archive.org/web/20070811162047/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=TO.6660.0.2&attributes.sampleSize=48&sampleText=sfollati&sampleSize=48) is an option.
Thanks, but we don’t need the grunge effect, fortunately! (I don’t like it!)
